name: In re Earl T. GRANT, Jr., et al., Appellees, v. Robert S. BUCK et ux., Appellants

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: In re Earl T. GRANT, Jr., et al., Appellees, v. Robert S. BUCK et ux., Appellants.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Decree affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Henry G. Hager, 3rd, Williamsport, Norman R. Bradley, Philadelphia, Stuart, Murphy, Hager & Smith, Williamsport, for appellants.
Robert C. Steiger, Philadelphia, for appellees, Earl T. Grant, Jr., et al.
casebody.head_matter:
334 A.2d 248
In re Earl T. GRANT, Jr., et al., Appellees, v. Robert S. BUCK et ux., Appellants.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 14, 1974.
Decided March 18, 1975.
Henry G. Hager, 3rd, Williamsport, Norman R. Bradley, Philadelphia, Stuart, Murphy, Hager & Smith, Williamsport, for appellants.
Robert C. Steiger, Philadelphia, for appellees, Earl T. Grant, Jr., et al.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
